Uses of Package
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal

  • Packages that use com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal 
    Package Description
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops
    Contains the classes for operations that generate or transform PDF files.
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal
    Contains the option classes for PDFElectronicSealOperation.
  • Classes in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal used by com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops 
    Class and Description
    PDFElectronicSealOptions
    Parameters for specifying the options required for PDFElectronicSealOperation.

    SealAppearanceOptions
    Parameters specifying set of elements (i.e.
    SealCredentialOptions
    This interface represents the basic contract for all the credential options to be used for applying PDF Electronic Seal by SealOptions.

    SignatureFormat
